__TOC__

== Packages we need to update and merge once Edgy is open ==

Check for new upstream versions, merge with Debian and make sure ubuntu changes are kept if still necessary (and if not mark that a sync is necessary)

Please use the merge-o-matic for this.  If you dont know how to, check the #ubuntu-devel logs for 1/7 or speak to Hobbsee on irc (or anyone else who knows about it)

For the complete list of Ubuntu package merges see http://merges.ubuntu.com/main.html and http://merges.ubuntu.com/universe.html<-- updated every hour.

=== Gamin rebuild ===

After Knot 1, assuming we decide to keep not using Gamin we need to rebuild these packages so they don't build-dep on libgamin0

To check if a package has been rebuilt, use:

apt-cache show foo | grep libgamin0
